mapper.select:
select count(1) from m_classificationinfo where 1=1
and Parent_Classification_ID='0000000000'
and Classification_ID in (select left(ClassificationPath,10) from m_classificationinfo where ClassificationName like CONCAT('%',#{cb.ClassificationName},'%'))

select Classification_ID,ClassificationName,Parent_Classification_ID,DisplayOrder,Description,CreateUser, DATE_FORMAT(CreateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') CreateDateTime,UpdateUser,DATE_FORMAT(UpdateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') UpdateDateTime, (select count(Classification_ID) from m_classificationinfo b where b.Parent_Classification_ID=a.Classification_ID) children_lg from m_classificationinfo a where 1=1
and Parent_Classification_ID='0000000000'
and Classification_ID in (select left(ClassificationPath,10) from m_classificationinfo where ClassificationName like CONCAT('%',#{cb.ClassificationName},'%'))
order by a.DisplayOrder desc limit #{cb.l_pre},#{cb.rowSize}

select Classification_ID,ClassificationName,Parent_Classification_ID,DisplayOrder,Description,CreateUser, DATE_FORMAT(CreateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') CreateDateTime,UpdateUser,DATE_FORMAT(UpdateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') UpdateDateTime, (select count(Classification_ID) from m_classificationinfo b where b.Parent_Classification_ID=a.Classification_ID) children_lg from m_classificationinfo a where a.Parent_Classification_ID=#{cb.Classification_ID} order by a.DisplayOrder desc
select count(1) from m_classificationinfo where ClassificationName=#{cb.ClassificationName} and Classification_ID!=#{cb.Classification_ID}
select case when max(DisplayOrder) is null then 0 else max(DisplayOrder)+1 end DisplayOrder from m_classificationinfo where Parent_Classification_ID=#{cb.Parent_Classification_ID} for update

select Classification_ID,ClassificationName,Parent_Classification_ID,DisplayOrder,Description,CreateUser, DATE_FORMAT(CreateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d') CreateDateTime,UpdateUser,DATE_FORMAT(UpdateDateTime,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') UpdateDateTime, (select count(Classification_ID) from m_classificationinfo b where b.Parent_Classification_ID=a.Classification_ID) children_lg from m_classificationinfo a where a.Classification_ID=#{cb.Classification_ID}
mapper.delete: delete from m_classificationinfo where locate( Classification_ID, (select DISTINCT getChildList_classificationinfo(#{cb.Classification_ID}) from m_classificationinfo) )>0
mapper.update: update m_classificationinfo set DisplayOrder=#{cb.DisplayOrder} where Classification_ID=#{cb.Classification_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT a.Classification_ID, a.Parent_Classification_ID, a.ClassificationName, a.DisplayOrder, DATE_FORMAT(b.Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d') Releasetime, count(b.ClassificationPath) cnt, (select count(1) from m_classificationinfo c where a.Classification_ID=c.Parent_Classification_ID) children_lg FROM m_classificationinfo a LEFT JOIN a_articlebasicinfo b on locate(a.Classification_ID,b.ClassificationPath)>0 and DATE_FORMAT(b.Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d')>=#{yesterday} and DATE_FORMAT(b.Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d')<=#{today} group by a.Classification_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(b.Releasetime,'%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY a.DisplayOrder DESC
